subject: I am pleased to inform you tha
body:
I am pleased to inform you that your funds are secured under our custody.
These two people posing as your next of kin and your attorney came here with the $250 recovery fee to reclaim your funds .
They want to pay the unpaid claim costs to access the funds because they said you died in a car accident and they need the funds for your funeral arrangements 
but I resist them .
I made it very clear to them that we will not accept the $250 from them until I hear from you to avoid a wrong transfer of your funds.
She said you where very clear about the WILL you wrote before the incident. We have your funds worth $76,700,000.00, which are still unclaimed from the Treasury Department till date .
The reclaim fee has to be paid by you if your did not authorized your sister and your attorney to claim the funds .
If you did authorized them, please let us know so that we can accept the $250 from them and release the funds to them, but 
if you did not authorized them, then you can pay the $250 and have your funds transferred to your account.
Best regard
Mr. David Robert Malpass.

subject: Re: I am pleased to inform you tha
body:
Hello Mr. David Robert Malpass,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear about this situation. I'm not aware of any such incident or having written a will.

Could you please provide more details about these individuals claiming to be my next of kin and attorney? Also, could you clarify what exactly is this recovery fee they are trying to pay?

I would also like to know more about the funds that are supposedly under your custody. How did they end up there and why are they unclaimed?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Charlene

subject: Re: I am pleased to inform you tha
body:
Gladly the imposter has been apprehend by FBI and will be justify by the law In regards of your funds to be authorized to you kindly forward us your full name home address and your valid ID before we can proceed

God bless you and your family.

subject: Re: I am pleased to inform you tha
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's great to hear that the imposter has been apprehended by the FBI. I'm sure justice will be served.

As for my funds, I'm curious about how this process works. Could you please explain it a bit more? How did these funds come into existence and why are they being authorized to me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Charlene

subject: Re: I am pleased to inform you tha
body:
Hello, dear beneficiary Charlene note this a compensation funds from USA. Presidential candidates, in regards of your funds to be authorized to you kindly provide us your suitable option to receive your funds with no further delay below is the option

1) Bank to bank wire transfer under 24 hours

2) Cash delivery to your very home address within 3 working days

3) By cryptocurrency payment BTC.

I await your response now before we can proceed.

subject: Re: I am pleased to inform you tha
body:

As for the options you've provided, I'm not very familiar with them. Could you explain how each one works? Especially the bank to bank wire transfer and cash delivery, those sound interesting.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Charlene
